Tag Quarry.name: Tag Quarry
Tag Quarry.flavor: Your attack shows all who the hunted is.
Tag Quarry.requirement: You must be wielding a heavy thrown weapon to use this power at range.
Tag Quarry.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier, and you can designate the target as your quarry as if you had used the Hunter’s Quarry class feature.

Pack Hunter Stance.name: Pack Hunter Stance
Pack Hunter Stance.flavor: You fight your chosen foe with a rhythm that shows your comrades how to form up during the assault.
Pack Hunter Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit your quarry, you or one ally within 5 squares of you can shift as a free action.

New Victim.name: New Victim
New Victim.flavor: You brutally choose a new quarry by making a swift attack.
New Victim.trigger: Your quarry is reduced to 0 hit points
New Victim.requirement: You must be wielding a heavy thrown weapon to use this power at range.
New Victim.effect: You can designate the target as your quarry as if you had used the Hunter’s Quarry class feature.
